website_summaries.verdict: Effective for cleaning the toilet, even if it has extremely stubborn stains.
pros: Does a good job of deodorizing the toilet as it cleans with a pleasing mild lemon scent
Each bottle should last for 800 flushes, so it's a good value
Cleans multiple parts of the toilet
Safe for all septic and sewer systems
cons: If you don't follow the directions carefully, you could make a significant mess

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Best!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a plastic bottle cleaner in my tank for a month now and my toilet bowl has stayed clean without the need for scrubbing even under the rim. The water is still blue and it still gives off a fresh scent when the toilet is flushed. I was previously using Iron Out because I have hard water and I was cleaning the bowl every week. I'm highly impressed with Vacplus Toilet Bowl Cleaner and won't use anything else again!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommended for lazy people
customer_reviews.text: This one is simply great in terms of easy-to-use. Just put it in a toilet and wait for ten minutes. It really works! It eliminates all the smells from oldy ceramics and washes off very tightly. Changing colors indicates how long it will last. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Seo

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Misleading directions
customer_reviews.text: These things work great! Keeps the bowl clean. The instructions are misleading. You do have to remove the clear plastic wrapping. Then you can submerge it into the holding talk. The one flaw is that if you dont flush every once in a while, a blue ring will remain once the water lowers a bit. It disappears after the next flush though. Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Steve N

customer_reviews.title: Bad directions!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not sure whats up with this should be easy to use toilet bowl cleaner. Directions say leave film on when placing in tank. Well if you leave the film on the cleaner floats!! Duh...so you need to remove the film cover flush toilet to as low as the water will go put in the back right corner and push down on it until water bubbles come up meaning that the holes that are now exposed can receive water. So bizarre. I emailed them but haven't heard anything and tried the FB site they list and it doesn't come up. Weird....
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Scronce

customer_reviews.title: It cleaned your toilet.
customer_reviews.text: I got the 3 pack three weeks ago and it cleaned the toilet bowl after few days of used. We have three people in ours household, because of the pamdamic we all work at home, that really increased number of usage of the toilet, and the watet is still very blue. Just make sure you drop the unit dar away to the water outrage as the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: SamH

customer_reviews.title: The directions on the package are wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I read the "How to Use" instructions on the package. It says to put the container in the corner of the tank without removing the protective film and keep it away from the water inlet and outlet. If you follow this instruction the little canister floats. Where it will wind up in the tank no one knows. One of the sketches on the amazon website says to "Tear off the package and put the cleaner into the tank". I tore of the clear wrap and put the container into the tank and held it down until it filled with water. I hope the product works better that the instructions are written.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Punte

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be doing exactly what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I hate cleaning our toilets with a scrub brush. Full stop. This product looks to be a game-changer for us! One important step, as it's a bit confusing when you read the directions: remove the plastic covering from the Vac Plus before dropping it into the corner of your toilet tank. Otherwise, it won't sink and won't actually work. :) Hopefully they'll fix that guidance on their packaging in the future. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: First the instruction say, leave outer film on! Obviously they won't work like that. After a few days the blue stopped coming out. I have to reach in and shake it around, then it comes out really blue! Then a couple flushes later the blue is gone. Half the time I flush the toilet I pull off the cover and try to figure out why they don't work.. They don't seem to keep the toilet any cleaner, maybe a little but it's not worth the hassle of jiggling the things around every other flush.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Lasher

customer_reviews.title: Good but not very long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These are simple to use, remove film (despite the incorrect instructions on the the product) place under water and hold it down until bubble stop escaping. The drawback, and why I rated this 3 stars is because it doesnt last long at all. Theres just two adults in my household and it lasted us about 2 weeks or so.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many such products but this by far lasts longer. I can see blue water up till a very long time. Also it cleans the bowl as well. The only issue is when it becomes lighter and sometimes it drifts to the center of tank system and hinders with water valves.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Come people, this cleaner doesn't actually clean anything! The sent is weak. Does turn the water in the bowl is a pretty blue... save you money, manually clean the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: TsimTsum

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It has a very good packaging. Comes with 3 large diffusers. As mentioned, if flushed 6 times a day, each pod should last nearly 5 months. The pods have a strong citrus smell when opened, but seems alright when placed inside. The color is medium dark blue and has a nice smell. I guess its going to last as advertised and will definitelybuy it again. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mohiuddin Imran

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Item comes pacakge very well, each was indivdual sealed and shrinked wraped. The quality seems really good, comes in a protective plastic cover unlike others I have used that are just exposed tablets. The scent was very pleasant and instructions on how to use are on the box and each cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: MSull44

customer_reviews.title: How to enable it to do what it’s made to do
customer_reviews.text: No instructions as to functionality. All it says is stick in toilet tank away from water flow. The thing floats around. It won’t stay in far corner from water flow. It didn’t instruct to punch plastic where holes were visible. But how else would blue liquid get out? Please advise. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Hertzell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Although it says lemon scent, you can't really smell much unless you open the toilet bowl top, which then all you see is bubbles from the cleaner instead of anything in the actual tank. This would be neat if it was the same automatic cleaner and scent without the blue dye. I'd rather have my toilet bowl water be clear rather than blue, just sort of strange to me. But other than that, it works good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon

customer_reviews.title: Decent product if it's not broken
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is probably a decent one and does what it is supposed to do but when it arrived all of the bottoms were cracked and broken making the product less useful. The product only lasted about a week and a half due to the opening at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Toilet Fresh
customer_reviews.text: This product does a good job of keeping the toilet clean and fresh, BUT it keeps knocking over in the tank. We had to put a rock on top to keep it from falling over and stopping the toilet from flushing. 3.5 stars, but could be 5 if made heavier so that it does not go over when toilet is flushed.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: These are so much better than the ducks.
customer_reviews.text: For a long while I've been using the weekly disposable blue coins. I took on a chance that the length of use would outweigh the extra cost. It's been two months now and I'm STILL using only the first of the three little blue bins. The density of coloration will wax and wane but the water is always blue. Seriously, two months. I'm never going back to those weekly blue ducks.
customer_reviews.author: matthew gilmore

customer_reviews.title: really nice product
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews of the vacplus and figured I would give it a try. Not only is it easy to use, but it works!. I will be a long time customer and will look at their other products as well. Folks, use products that actually work and this is one of them. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Drrick1999

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PRETTY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: These work fairly good but I don't think last as long as indicated. Color starts fading sooner than indicated use and toilet bowl starts getting a little dirty. Might just be our water here. All in all a great deal however and I will purchase again. The instructions need refining. They indicate something along the lines to not remove plastic film before placing in toilet however there is a plastic wrapper (like a film) that must come off to work. It should say don't remove from plastic housing or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: RLF

customer_reviews.title: It lasts
customer_reviews.text: Every time I would try a new product like this, I would find that it never lasts as long as they say. They always say up to what ever. Vacplus said about the same thing only they really do last. Best I found.
customer_reviews.author: Roger F

customer_reviews.title: Fits tank with fitted lid where hanging bottles fail
customer_reviews.text: This toilet bowl cleaner we ordered from Vacplus is a real winner. One of our toilets could not handle a cleaner that hooked to the side of the tank, and was very inefficient. This one sits in the bottom of the tank and just works like a charm. A nice light scent, and just a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: CoolPhotoTools

customer_reviews.title: Be patient - wait at least 24 hours for the blue.
customer_reviews.text: It works great once I realized that it took at least 24 hours for the plastic to dissolve in my toilets. First two I tried didn’t have blue water after an hour, so I thought I had misread it and removed the plastic wrapper. They only lasted ten days. So I tried again, leaving the plastic on. After at least 24 hours, I had blue water and they’ve lasted for 14 days so far. I haven’t noticed any scent tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Crap don't waste you hard-earned money
customer_reviews.text: Crap don't waste your hard-earned money. They do not clean or help keep the toilet clean. All they seem to do is turn the water blue. They are a complete waiste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding auto toilet cleaning accessory
customer_reviews.text: It's nice that I don't have to keep manually adding Lysol into the toilet bowl. With this, I can just leave it in the tank and it will do the job on its own to keep the tank and bowl clean and smells really good. My bathroom feels like brand new now.
customer_reviews.author: Felix G.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to last a while
customer_reviews.text: I've had these in my toilets for the past 2 weeks. The water is still coming out blue. However, I question how well the chemicals in this actually work. I cleaned my toilets before using. However, there is still a ring of gross build-up along the bowl where the water level is.
customer_reviews.author: Prettylights808

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is nice! Bathroom smells clean and welcoming!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this toilet bowl cleaner smells and packed. Looks like it will last a long time and withstand many flushes! Smells citrus and clean at the same time! Amazing value! Recommend keep your bathroom clean and keep your guests happy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, stop cleaning your toilet bowl manually.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this is a Five-Star product in my opinion. The best experience toilet bowl cleaner we have ever used! My wife and I love the smell and it really cleans the bowl easily. Three cans in a pack for $17.99, highly recommend you use this product and I guarantee, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just put the jar in your tank and flush. I like that it does not leave marks in the bowl like other cleaners after a lot of us. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chakris Ngeunjuntr

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck!
customer_reviews.text: I like the blue color. It helps hide the stains. It seems to help my tiolet to be cleaner. It does not stay in place and it kept getting stuck and making my tiolet run. I even tried to tie it up, which helps alot. However it made its way out of my tie up a few times and got stuck again. I didn't know it has a scent and I used a whole one in 2 weeks. Next, I will just get the sinking tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Chiara Duran

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I wouldn’t have to do to much to clean the toilet for a while and it has worked great so far but I do still have to brush it clean weekly to get the ring off.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It actually cleans the toilet bowl and it smells very nice. But it stained my toilet bowl blue which doesn't look very pleasant. I wish the dye was less strong.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Super easy keeps toilet cleaner longer
customer_reviews.text: East open package. All you have to do is take off the plastic and put the whole thing in the toilet. Let it sit for at least 10 minutes and voila. Super easy. I cleaned my toilet beforehand and it seems to be keeping it cleaner longer. The blue is the same shade as the day I put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Delmy B Perez

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a little over a month ago. So far it is doing exactly what they said it would do, a ( slight ) lemon scent, deep blue color, and EASY to use. They say it will last about 6 months depending on the amount of flushes in that time, only time will tell, but as of NOW, I like this product, and if it last any where near the 6 months, I will be purchasing it again.Just wish that the lemon scent was STRONGER not OVERWHELMING.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Toilet
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product expecting to stop using the round chlorine tablets to keep toilet clean this bowl cleaner did not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent and long-lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This has a really nice fresh scent and it's not too strong. It's really convenient because it lasts a long time, drop it in the tank and forget it your toilet stays clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: BGM

customer_reviews.title: will not clog toilet
customer_reviews.text: this sits at bottom of tank not interfering with mechanism and will not have large chunks breaking off and causing a problem
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: all it does is turn blue. Doesn't eliminate stains, Doesn't prevent stains. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Sevde

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long, but has no scent at all
customer_reviews.text: Only blue color. No sent, and a lot of residuals inside the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with no effort needed
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use and leave my toilet looking clean. It’s a nice addition with my Clorox toilet bowl wand. Two major benefits are that i don’t have to clean my toilet as often and second is that this product makes cleaning with my wand easier, no more trying to scrap toilet bowl rings.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but KEEP YOUR COMET CLEANSER
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but KEEP YOUR COMET CLEANSER cuz product does not prevent ring around the water line.
customer_reviews.author: Blitzy Cain

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product does nothing but float in the toilet tank,just drop in!!! Have had in my tanks for 4 days , no blue.Someone suggested to put a rock on top to keep it from floating,not in the instructions.Bought a box of 6 ,what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: barry aramburu

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help much
customer_reviews.text: They didn't seem to help keeping the toilet bowl clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Design looks smart.Liked the fresh lemon scent while opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Stains the floor, Toilet and the nails
customer_reviews.text: Stains the floor, Toilet and the nails. Our toilt got clogged. The product was sitting in tank for over few days. The water became visocus and terrible color! While taking it out stained, nail hand, floor, walls and toilet. Hige bunder to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sumeet Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Stain
customer_reviews.text: This product have Lemon scent and kind of strong. This have blue color when place in toilet bowel. And clean stain pretty good eventhough need couple flush to see the difference
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Blue water but still get water stains
customer_reviews.text: Blue water but still get water stain at water level in bowl.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't clean stains, no better then what you buy at Walmart & more money. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well. Kinda early to tell. Well it’s been in the tank of stool now several days and the water in the stool is not blue, it’s a very dirty grey. This I don’t like at all. Would not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Pastrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This was simple to install and it works great. The lemon scent isn't too overpowering and the product doesn't leave a blue film in the toilet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't make a difference to use this product. It's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rumpal Sidhu

customer_reviews.title: Great product for keeping bowl cleaner and smelling great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!! Highly recommend. Super easy to set up. Keep it away from the water inlet, and it'll last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Aman Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: lasted three months with a lot of flushing going on
customer_reviews.text: didn't notice the scent as much as would have liked
customer_reviews.author: M. JONES

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product different from the others in the application, and results.
customer_reviews.author: sanford h steinman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great scent!
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and has been doing a great job in keeping the toilet bowl clean longer. We were previously using Iron Out because we have hard water, and we were cleaning the bowl twice a week. We are highly impressed with Vacplus Toilet Bowl Cleaner and won't use anything else again!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good !
customer_reviews.text: I feel bad for knowing there is a product like this. I am kind of lazy person who hates to clean the toilet. This one turns the water into blue and removes the odor smell and strains. The product life can be determined by the watercolor. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Senthil

customer_reviews.title: Great product for easy home use
customer_reviews.text: Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner was excellent, I really liked the way the product worked and would 100% recommend it to another person due to the effectiveness of the product and the simplicity of the user experience.
customer_reviews.author: Atif

customer_reviews.title: Best toilet bowl cleaner for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toilet bowl cleaner, looks and smells good. Also has some good life for each filter and almost cleans the bowl on its own without any more effort.
customer_reviews.author: Sai K

customer_reviews.title: Remove the plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Overall awesome but *****REMOVE plastic.****** The instructions “to leave film on” is for their round standard blue products. I’m pretty sure their graphic designer just “copy/pasted” the instructions from the old product to the new (this) product.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Kim

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: It stays for a long time and doesn’t leave any marks inside the toilet, it really cleans good
customer_reviews.author: Haneen

customer_reviews.title: Must buy product
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. Price is reasonable. Gives such a fresh feel. Absolutely amazing. I am so happy to have it. Must buy product.
customer_reviews.author: SSM

customer_reviews.title: Blue cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to place and quick cleaner. Very effective clean compare to my previous cleaners, happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Balu

customer_reviews.title: Tip over
customer_reviews.text: It let tipping over and caused a mess in the toilet. Had to often adjust after a flushing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Good scent
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy another popular brand but it has no scent. My apartment is an old building so I want something that smells good which can help cover the smells in the bathroom. This one has a lemon scent and it keeps the toilet clean at every flush.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Simple Installation
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be easier to install. Just drop it in the tank in a corner and it does the rest. Will have see how it holds up over time. The smell is...very clean smelling haha
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: No smell for your toilets
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this it does not work. No smell
customer_reviews.author: Sjmjr

customer_reviews.title: Good Auto Toilet Clean
customer_reviews.text: We like this product. It is easy to use and last long! Exactly what I need. I have a baby and have I time for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCandySC

customer_reviews.title: All in one toilet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Live the upgraded toilet cleaner. All the product is in a plastic container. Lasts ages too. Nicely done VacPlus.
customer_reviews.author: DTM

customer_reviews.title: Good product, BUT
customer_reviews.text: If you have a vertical valve this item is not for you. As you flush the container moves inside of the toilet ball and stops valve from closing. Water runs, but the ball never fills up.
customer_reviews.author: Yashka

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smelling bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I have used other blue toilet bowl cleaners, and those stained my bowls with blue funk. I thought I would give these a try. These cleaners create a nice lemon smell with faint blue water. So far I really like these!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bentzinger

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use. Nice fragance.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fragance, you can feel it once you open the box. Easy to use. Just peel plastic wrap and put it inside tank. No messing with tablets or staining your finges. Wait 5 minutes and its ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Easy to use. Only thing I want to advice the buyers is to make sure the tank is standard sized. For one of the bathrooms, we had a slightly smaller tank and it ends up blocking the water outlet, so ended up flushing more than required. Overall it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes the toilet look very clean
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my toilet looking extra clean. Makes the water looks a nice blue color and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Osog

customer_reviews.title: Effective and long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is extremely long lasting which makes the product very cost effective, the scent is subtle yet long lasting. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JP WOHLER

customer_reviews.title: Couple day review
customer_reviews.text: Water isn’t as blue as I expected, but will see how it goes in the coming days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Easy
customer_reviews.text: With this cleaner, my toilet maintenance is now easy and it smells sweet! Great product, it is now part of the household supplies family.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Torres

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 1 week now. So far, it seems to be doing what it's supposed to, but it's hard to be sure since I haven't been using it very long. I suppose time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nares

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally send reviews but I have been so happy with this product I had to. I have used similar products for years and have not seen the overall cleanliness I have seen with these. Love them and will buy them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Slater

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product . The 6 pack is cost efficient and really keeps the toilet clean, 800 flushes per bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Nitvij

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a couple of weeks ago. The lemon scent is noticeable but not too strong. My bowl is easier to clean than before. Easy to use. We keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Smells like lemon
customer_reviews.text: The product smells like lemon and gives blue tint to the water. Just installed the product today and it is easy to use. I hope that this lasts for large number of flushes and does intense cleaning action.
customer_reviews.author: M patel

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Scent is relatively mild not pungent, which is a good thing to me. Very easy to use, just leave it in your toilet tank.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't make sense
customer_reviews.text: Ramming around in the tank. Every time I go to the bathroom, I worry. It makes a nasty noise. I threw them away. I suspect it's just dye. The effect is not very obvious under my observation...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Durant

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been installed about a week and still going strong. Only took a couple of minutes to get installed. If the lifespan lives up to the claims, I'll be a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy513

customer_reviews.title: Fresh lemon scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 6 bottle pack of vacplus automatic toilet bowl cleaner.smells good and easy to use.the absolute best.excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: william tan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Before using Vacplus automatic toilet bowel cleaner, the rim around toilet would get dark and gross looking, now with the automatic cleaner in the tank that no longer happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jumping James

customer_reviews.title: Toilet bowl water not blue
customer_reviews.text: After several flushings, water in toilet bowl is yellow (not blue). Said scent is supposed to be lemon but I don't smell it. The biggest turnoff is yellow water.
customer_reviews.author: Vaness Jackson-Archer

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer with great experience
customer_reviews.text: It’s the first time I use this product and it does what it promised to do. It is very easy to install and have a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ouyang Lili

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of cleaning toilet bowls so often, and this has done the trick. No more nasty ring forming at the water level!
customer_reviews.author: Henry W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it smells. I opened the box and all I could smell was the refreshing lemon. My products were in not broken and perfectly wrapped. I love how clean my toilets are.
customer_reviews.author: Cleneisha Ware

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works best if you clean the toilet bowl first. These are easy to insert into the tank and the smell isn't overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Staying long time.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really great item, more than a month the blue color stay , easy to use it , I don’t think there’s any scent .
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Habashy

customer_reviews.title: Clean & Healthy Toilet
customer_reviews.text: It works. Prevents unwanted issues from like rings scales and scum build up. Gives your toilet a clean look. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Neto

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a great value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, stays in place and it’s cleaner in your tank it does not leave a clump of blue in the corner
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long!!
customer_reviews.text: It does its job as it says it does by lasting long. Easy to install and use. Smells strong and good when you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great toilet product!
customer_reviews.text: With so many imposters, it is great that an easy to use and effective product is available. Love the mild scent, the blue bowl and the cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Corley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best I’ve used.. smells great .. lasts long and keeps bowl clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Roy

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: No scent, does not keep toilet clean, tipped over in back of toilet and dumped out all the blue.
customer_reviews.author: R Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Wallet saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. And last a long time. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Riley Turner

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice, lasted 3 weeks in 2 different toilets, did not keep the toilets clean
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice, lasted 3 weeks in 2 different toilets, did not keep the toilets clean
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Vacplus Toilet Bowl Cleaner (3-BOTTLE PACK), Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner, Long-Lasting Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablets in Bottle with Fresh Scent
feature_bullets: 【EFFECTIVE CLEANING & SAFE USE】- Keeping the toilet clean effectively, Vacplus toilet tank cleaner can retard the accumulation of stains and dirt in the tank, water pipe and other parts of the toilet easily. Give you a “new” toilet bowl! No harmful substances, no corrosive!

【LONG-LASTING & DEODORANT】- Designed with a slow release technique, each toilet cleaner bottle can clean your toilet for up to 800 flushes. These toilet tank cleaners can eliminate the odor of the toilet bowl with fresh scent.

【USING METHOD】- DO NOT open the cap! Put the cleaner into a tank, and keep the cleaner away from water inlet and water outlet. Grab the cap and press the bottle into the water. Make sure water flow into the toilet tank bottle thru the four semicircular inlets. Remember to wait for 10 minutes before first use. Please replace it when the blue in the tank fades.
【NOTICE】- The main function of this natural toilet bowl cleaner is to keep the toilet clean & delay the dirt increasing. For a better effect, it is recommended to brush the toilet basin before use.
【BEST SERVICE】 - For the blue toilet bowl bottles, Vacplus promises a full refund or a replacement FOR 1 YEAR under your normal use. Just contact us if you have any problems. Buy Vacplus now!!
